About Me

FrontendAngularDeveloper

Hello, I'm Chandu Varma K

I'm a passionate Angular frontend developer with a keen eye for user-centric design and a knack for creating visually appealing web experiences.

With expertise in Angular, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, I craft responsive and dynamic web applications that elevate user interactions.

Currently, I'm honing my skills at Nstarx Inc. where I collaborate with a talented team to build innovative solutions for complex problems.
